name: TopicPolicy
description: The AWS::SNS::TopicPolicy resource associates Amazon SNS topics with a policy.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS topics.

properties.name: Topics
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy. You can use the Ref function to specify an AWS::SNS::Topic resource.
